https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t4By6YGW7P0ZyXt1PV56Eat1zhj.jpg Mateo and his boyfriend, Marc, arrive home after a night out with Luke, a guy they've just met. After an argument, Mateo leaves the flat and bumps into Jon, a drug dealer they have called. Mateo convinces Jon to take him to his house where he discovers he can't feel anything if it's not through pain. According to Mateo
